instruction: How to created CWR so
output: To create a CWR Contractor Workforce Request SO follow these steps: 1. In OneC open the Quick SOgtgt Raise new demand gtgt New demand . 2. Fill in the fields of Project amp Assignment and Location as we fill in for a regular Staffing SO 3. Select SO type as CWRgtgt Service defauls to Custom service gtgt Select grade and choose a Non CCA demand role that is closer to your requirement For the list of NON CCA role codes and job codes Please refer to the worksheet embedded in the PM Handbook gtgt Select the job code with CW00 available in drop down list based on grade selection amp add the Technical skill individually. 4. Fill in the reset of the details and click on Submit to raise the SO request.  If you need any further assistance with creating a CWR SO please reach out to the SOSimplificationPM@cognizant.com  Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

instruction: job code change
output: To change the job code in an existing open SO follow these steps:  1. Login to https://compass.esa.cognizant.com  and  Click on Main Menu and select Resource Management. 2. Click on Request Resource and then select Create or Review SO. 3. Search by SO ID and Project ID. 4. Modify the Job code field with the desired job code. 5. Click on Complete Order. 6. Click on Save and Submit to submit the updated SO request.  Please note that only the job code field can be modified in an existing open SO. If you need to modify any other information please contact the TSC Shared Services team through the Servicenow portal https://ctsccprod.service-now.com/ss . Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can you assist me with updating the income tax computation method
output: Log in to MyPay: Access the MyPay portal using your credentials. Navigate to Income Tax Computation Method: Go to MyPay -gt MyInvestments -gt Income Tax Computation Method. Select the Tax Regime: You will have the option to choose between the old tax regime with exemptions and the new tax regime without exemptions. Use the simulator available in the same section to compare the tax impact between the two regimes. Submit Your Choice: Once you have reviewed the results and decided on the regime that best fits you click the Submit button. Note that once submitted the regime selected is final and no further changes will be allowed in MyPay for the current financial year. Review Your Tax Computation Sheet: After submitting your choice you can view your actual tax liability for the current financial year through MyPay -gt MyStatements -gt Tax Computation.

instruction: I am new joinee help me with onboarding process
output: Welcome to Cognizant We hope that you are all set to be inducted into Cognizant to incite your next awesome phase of Financial Empowerment eased with the balanced combination of IQ and EQ. Your access to  CognizantOn portal has been enabled. It will serve as a one stop solution for all your Post Joining Formalities Portal Navigations and provide a Roadmap to help you accomplish key tasks for your seamless integration into Cognizant. Important Onboarding Tasks: Week 1 Tasks:  Raise Software or Hardware and related requests through ServiceNow. Here is the link: ServiceNow  IT Self Service View salary details verify update information and contacts through HCM. Here is the link: HCM Complete mandatory e-learnings through My Learning Studio. Home - SumTotal Submit timesheets weekly through ESA. Here is the link: ESA Timesheet Request permanent or temporary access cards. Here is the link: OneCognizant Search for Access Card 2.0  Week 2 Tasks:  Manage tax-saving and pay slips through MyPay. MyPay link: OneCognizant Search for MyPay  Week 3 Tasks:  Enroll dependents purchase top-up premiums and avail MHC through Medi Assist. Here is the link: Medi Assist  Week 4 Tasks:  Access details through Associate 360.  Here is the link: OneCognizant Search for Associate 360 Submit goals through Go Perform. Goal Setting link: OneCognizant Search for GoPerform  Month 2 and 3 Tasks:  One on One Connect with your Manager Provide your feedback in Qualtrics. Qualtrics Feedback  For further details you can refer - Onboarding Tool Kit We wish you all the best lets learn work grow and inspire together

instruction: What is the procedure to approve compliances submitted by the owner in Controls Management
output: 1. Login to CCMT Application gt Change role as Approver  2. Click on the TO DO tab. 3. Click on Compliance 4. All the task submitted by owner for approval would be available on approvers To-Do. 5. Go to the compliance verify the compliance details from user details and status column available in the grid status comment and download POC. 6. Click on Control Details link to verify the control status and comments. 7. Click on approve radio button. 8. Pop -up will appear re- validate the owner action such as status reported comments added performed on date  download the POC check the Audit trail. 9. Default Approve radio button will be selected. 10. Add comments and click on submit button. 11. Compliance Approved successfully will appear on screen.

instruction: How can I submit a Not applicable compliance status in Controls Management
output: 1. Login to CCMT Application. 2. Click on the TO DO tab 3. Click on Compliance 4. Click on Report Control hyperlink 5. Report all controls status accordingly add comment. 6. Click on save and submit. 7. Compliance pop up screen will appear with compliance status as Not applicable. 8. Add justification and select illustrative reason. 9. Click on submit button Compliance submitted successfully. will appear on screen.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the process to submit compliance with a differed POD in Compliance Manager
output: 1. Login to CCMT Application. 2. Click on the TO DO tab 3. Click on Compliance 4. Click on Report Control hyperlink 5. Report the control status accordingly click on save and submit. 6. Compliance pop up screen will appear with status as Complied. 7. Change Performed on Date equals to or less than due date. 8. Confirmation message will appear on screen Are you sure you want to change the Performed-on Date. 9. Click on cancel or continue 10. Cancel will bring back the previous page. 11. Continue will bring POD reason dropdown box on screen. 12. Select POD reason from the dropdown  13. Add details and upload proof 14. Click on submit button Compliance Submitted successfully message will appear on screen.

instruction: What steps are needed to submit a Complied compliance status in Controls Management

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the process to onboard a project in Compliance Manager
output: 1. Login to CCMT Application. 2. Go to project tab 3. Click on manage project 4. Click on create project button 5. Select the Project Id from the drop down 6. Selected project details will be fetched on screen click on save and next button. 7. Project demographic page will appear. 8. Click on  icon add project demographics 9. Select the country state business unit vertical service business entity type and module. 10. Click on save button message will appear Project demographics saved successfully. 11. Click on save and next button message will appear Data saved successfully. 12. Select the compliances to be mapped 13. Click on map compliances 14. Click on Next button 15. Select the user row and assign the role by selection the checkbox 16. Click on next button Select the compliances to be assigned and select the owner and approver from the drop down click on assign. 17. Click on Next button 18. Go to scheduling screen 19. By default unscheduled radio button is selected select the compliances to be scheduled. 20. Select first due date on and schedule frequency. 21. 21 Click on schedule button. 22. Click on next verify the summary. 23. Click on Generate Project Button.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the key functions of Pardot
output: Depending on the type of business Pardot can be utilized for various purposes including: Email Marketing: This includes one-off emails to lists of prospects and automated email journeys. Email automation can be based on specific actions triggers or wait periods making it particularly suitable for lead nurturing. Forms: Forms are used to capture data from new prospects or enrich existing prospect records. Additionally you can specifically request data for the blank fields on the prospects record. Engagement History: This feature compiles a log of all activities that prospects engage in across your online assets e.g. website landing pages. Segmentation: Various options are available to divide your prospect database into distinct audiences for more targeted marketing. Scoring: Prospects are scored based on their engagement behavior. Lead Qualification: The combination of Pardots score and grade helps identify prospects that your sales team should prioritize. Marketing Analytics: This involves reporting on campaign performance and the marketing-influenced pipeline supported by Campaign Influence.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I reject or close a nomination request in GM360 where Im the approver
output: If you have received an approval and do not want to proceed with the case further please follow the below steps to reject/ close the case. Please note that rejecting the case will stop the workflow and the visa processing will not be considered further. 1. Please login to 1C gt GM360gt select appropriate role PM/Onsite Manager/ Additional Approver. 2. Navigate to the Approval screen from the Alerts and Notifications/ select case from the dashboard. 3. In the Approval screen click on the Reject option available at the bottom. 4. Add Rejection Comments and click on the Submit option. Only for Additional approver role system will have an option to continue the case when you click on reject the request select No if you dont want to proceed further or Yes if you want to continue for the question Case to proceed further.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What should I do if I need more details before granting approval for a Business Visa request
output: If you have received an approval email/ notification and need more clarity you should share back the case for additional details. Please follow the below steps to send back the approvals: 1. Please login to 1C gt GM360gt select appropriate role PM/Onsite Manager/ Additional Approver. 2. Navigate to the Approval screen from the Alerts and Notifications/ select case from the dashboard. 3. In the Approval screen click on the Send Back option available at the bottom. 4. Add Send Back Comments and click on the Submit option.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What should I do if Im not the right approver for a Business Visa case in GM360
output: If you have received an approval email/ notification and not the right POC you should delegate your approval to the appropriate approver. Please follow the below steps to delegate the approval: 1. Please login to 1C gt GM360gt select appropriate role PM/Onsite Manager/ Additional Approver. 2. Navigate to the Approval screen from the Alerts and Notifications/ select case from the dashboard. 3. In the Approval screen click on the Delegate Approval option available at the bottom. 4. Enter the Delegate ID/ Name and provide Comments. 5. Click on the Submit option.

instruction: How can I  view my pending approval requests in the GM360 Application
output: If you have received an approval email/ notification or a case is pending for your approval please follow the below steps to view your approvals: 1. Once navigated to the details page you will be able to see all the pending notifications. b. Click on the Your Case Dashboard tile from the Landing Page and you will be able to see the cases tagged under your role.

output: Leads are people who have shown some level of interest in your product or service. Examples include signing up on the site filling out a form downloading a buyers guide giving their information at a trade show booth etc. Every individual should be entered into the system as a lead. instruction: What should I do to complete my data and documents gathering in this application
output: Once a case is nominated and received approval associate will receive an email to start sharing the details for visa processing. 1. Please login to 1C gt GM360gt select role as Associate. 2. Navigate to the Case Details page and once you land into the Data and Document Gathering screen there will be a detailed prerequisite section instructions which will guide you the next step by step process for data and documents updates. 3. Review the details that were captured and approved earlier which will be used for visa processing: Nomination details Profile Details Visa Evaluation Details Additional Details and the Proposed Visa Type by the Global Mobility etc. 4. Once the review is completed navigate to Data and Documents sub-sections and update the details. 5. Do a final review of all the case details under the Review and Submit sub section and Submit for Global Mobility Review.

instruction: How is OneTransport data being included for emission calculation using GHG model
output: OneTransport data will be used by having OneTransport FTE we are capturing OneTransport FTE from the user and below formula is being used for the same: Based on the FTE details provided by user on FTE tab for FTE Using OneTransport  Work Commute Through OneTransport   FTE Using OneTransport City EIF Derive the effort for which peer intensity EIF has to be applied use same logic as in project ie: - Work Commute Through Other Transport  Sum of Cognizant FTE from CTS Office amp Client Total Including Unbilledw/o OneTranportIntensity Factor per FTE from 2023 Inventory tCO2/FTE Cognizant FTE from CTS Office amp Client Total Including Unbilledw/o OneTranport  WFOFTECTSampCLIENT - No. of FTE using OneTransport Calculate total Work Commute  Work Commute Through OneTransport  Work Commute Through Other Transport

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the different user roles available in Controls Management
output: Owner  The user will have access to owners module to provide certification / self- assessment on applicable compliances create remediation plans in case of non-compliance. The user will have access to multiple dashboards and reports. Approver  The user will have access to approvers module to approve the compliances and remediation plan for non-compliances that have been reported by an owner. The user will have access to multiple dashboards and reports. Reviewer  The user will have access to reviewers module and have an umbrella view of all the active compliances presents in the tool its submission and their status details. Additionally the reviewer has access to Dashboards can download reports view history generate certificates and follow up with users.  Note: Anyone who needs to be an approver should have a role in RHMS and allocation in ESA

instruction: How to update profile page in One Transport
output: Please follow the below navigation to update profile: 1. Login to https://onecognizant.cognizant.com 2. Search and launch One Transport application 3. Click on Profile from top right corner of the page 4. The below details are required for profile submission: 5. Present Address: Kindly update address in HCM application before 4 hours from profile update 6. Choose Nearest Landmark 7. Area: City amp Area 8. Office: City amp Facility 9. Mobile: Kindly update Phone number and authenticate it in HCM application before 4 hours from profile update 10. Special Condition if any: Expectant mother/Injured/Physically Challenged 11. IGS: Intergate Shuttle Service IGS field is a mandatory field in One Transport profile page to avail the Shuttle Transport services Click on yes to avail shuttle services once the profile is submitted the QR code will be enabled for scanning while availing shuttle services 12. Click on I Acknowledge box 13. Submit Profile Note: 1. Present address amp Authenticated phone number will be reflecting only after 4 hours after the update in HCM 2. All services will be combined and will be on shared basis only in adherence to the unified timings slots listed for the facility 3. Profile page completion is mandatory for raising any cab service requests.

instruction: Who should we contact to obtain the L2 extension biometrics appointment notice
output: Please note a change in process. If you have any immediate family members in the U.S. in dependent visa status please file their applications directly with USCIS. Please note that Global Mobility did not and cannot prepare the dependent forms I-539/I-539A or I-765 EAD applications for dependents as these are considered personal applications. This will prevent delays and documents getting lost in transit. Please work with a personal attorney for assistance with completing the forms filing and notice questions. Dependent application fees will be reimbursed by Cognizant. Please refer to the attached instructions below for your reference. Cognizant Global Mobility GM files H-1B/L1 extension petitions in advance so that associates can receive their receipt notice and then file dependent H-4/L-2 OR EAD applications before the expiration of a spouses or childs I-94.

instruction: I am npt able to create SO and Quick SO is asking me to create CR in PCB. How to resolve this issue
output: To raise an internal CR PM must navigate to the Project Baseline Dashboard using- ESA gt Classic Menu/ Main Menu gt Project Baseline Dashboard gt Project ID Click on the Correction button against the project and select Request Contingency to proceed gtgt Select valid reasons for internal CR gtgt Select EDP/EDL/EPL for routing CR for approval from the drop-down gtgt Once the resource details and PPMs are entered the user needs to click on Calculate Cost to generate a cost against the entered PPMs. Once the process is completed the user needs to add comments and click Submit to send the internal CR for approval. Click the icon CR round icon in red gtgt select the project gtgt proceed for approval.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Quick So not opening  thowing gateway error
output: To resolve the issue with Quick SO please follow the below troubleshooting steps:  Close all the existing IE browsers and open a new one. Select Tools option from the browser. Click on Internet Options. Go to Connections and then click on LAN Settings. Make sure that the Proxy settings option is checked. Check the following options:      Automatically detect settings Use a proxy server for your LAN Bypass proxy server for local addresses   Enter the following details:      Address: proxy.cognizant.com Port: 6050   Click on the Advanced button near the Port number and give exception as: 10..cognizant.com in the exceptions text field. Click on OK. Click on General tab and then click on Delete button. Check Temporary internet files Cookies and History and uncheck Preserve Favorites Website Data. Click on Delete. Click on Content tab and then click on Clear SSL State. Click on OK.  Additionally please follow the below compatibility view settings:  Open a new IE browser and press ALT  T or click on Tools. Type cognizant.com in Add this website and click on Add. Check the check boxes Include updated website list from Microsoft and Display intranet sites in Compatibility view. Click on Close. Click on RUN and enter temp. Select all and delete the files.  Once you have completed the troubleshooting try accessing the application again. Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

instruction: How to send a notice to my new validated address
output: To send a notice to new validated address please follow below steps: 1.  Please navigate to 1C gt Post Processing app to access the application. 2.  In home page If notice is available for tagged case click View notice button. 3.  In the Visa Type and Case ID dropdown select the applicable visa type and case ID respectively. 4. Click on Send Notice button.  5. If the address is not validated Update the address fields select the correct country and click on Validate  button. Please make sure the ZIP code is correct. 6. If the address is not getting validated remove address line 2 and try again. Accept the suggested address. 7.  Pop up Address is valid message will confirm successful validation. 8. Click on Submit button. Once successfully submitted  a tracking ID will be generated. 9. Once tracking ID  will be generated notice will be delivered to given address within 10-15 days.

instruction: When will an associate receive the L1 extension extended I-94 card or L1 Extension updated I94
output: When USCIS approves an H-1B OR L1 extension extension petition USCIS will issue a new H-1B OR L1 extension approval notice also known as a Form I-797A with a new I-94 card attached to the bottom of that approval notice. The new I-94 card is evidence that ones H-1B OR L1 extension status has been extended. This is not the visa or visa stamp. The visa stamp is different and must be obtained at a U.S. Consulate outside of the US using the new I-797 approval notice. If you receive an I-797B you will not have an I-94 card attached to the approval notice and would require undergoing visa stamping in order for the approval notice to take effect. Please refer to the I-797 FAQ you will receive upon Cognizant notifying you of your approval notice. Once your petition is approved it should be delivered to our Cognizant offices within 3-4 weeks. After we receive the approval notice you will receive instructions on how to obtain the hard copy of your approval notice to your home.

instruction: Can I receive the hard copy of my approval notice if Im outside the US
output: Yes Please follow below steps to receive the hard copy of your approval notice: 1.  Please navigate to 1C gt Post Processing app to access the application. 2.  In home page If notice is available for tagged case click on View notice button. 3.  In the Visa Type and Case ID dropdown select the applicable visa type and case ID respectively.   4. Click on Send Notice button. 5. If the address is not validated update the address fields select the correct country and click on Validate button. Please make sure the ZIP code is correct. 6. If the address is not getting validated remove address line 2 and try again. Accept the suggested address. 7.  Pop up Address is valid message will confirm successful validation of address. 8. Click on Submit button. Once successfully submitted  a tracking ID will be generated. 9. Once tracking ID  will be generated notice will be delivered to given address within 10-15 days.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is DCFC
output: Carbon calculator is designed to measure and report estimate of GHG emissions generated by Cognizant operations while delivering projects and services to its clients. The calculator is based on Cognizants latest published inventory. The model reference data is planned to be refreshed annually aligning to latest inventory of the organization as published in org GHG report.It is a standalone app 1C with systemic data integration for actuals to calculate emissions at deal / project / account level. Its key features include - Estimation with versioning  at opportunity and project level - FTE Business Travel Asset informationMonthly KPI submission and calculation of carbon emissions at project level LTD and YTDExcel export for emission summary output and input at project and opportunity and account level

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the key actions for improvement on emissions at engagement level
output: Current model is largely FTE influenced being apportioned from org inventory for most factors. It does not have archetype/life cycle specific influence factors. Effort involved on project contractor mix business travel and project specific IT assets are the key levers impacting total carbon footprint. Productivity improvement / COD reduction CII themes  resulting in FTE release shall potentially reduce the carbon footprint of the project.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is Green House Gases Protocol and scope 1/2/3 emissions Reduction
output: GHG Protocol is international reference standard that establishes comprehensive global standardized frameworks to measure and manage greenhouse gas GHG emissions from private and public sector operations value chains and mitigation actions.Greenhouse gas emissions are classified under 3 scopes  scope 1/2/3.Scope 1  These are direct emissions such as fuel and chemicals e.g. gas used by vehicles refrigerants used to cool offices and data centers.Scope 2  These are indirect emissions from purchased energy and heat in ofces and data center operations. electricity steam heat generated by third parties and used in facilities operations.Scope 3 - all other indirect emissions including those that come from the supply chain of cognizant operations including for example the procurement of equipment supporting services business travel disposal of waste employee commute etc.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the work location related considerations in the carbon calculator
output: Key considerations for emissions are effort expended on the delivery activity and the work location related factors are as belowWork from Cognizant facility - Model allocates the emissions from facility operations according to annual FTE reference units correlated to the geographic location of the workforce employed in the project activity. Emission intensity factor emissions / FTE is used along with total effort involved from the location to derive total emissionsEmployee commute  commute emissions are considered with industry published reference paper and peer study NOT organization specific input. Model adds commute emissions for only the effort spent in work from office mode for the project/account/bid scope with intensity factor emissions/FTE derived from organization level commute emissions used in 2022 GHG inventory. The EIF is refreshed annually to align with latest organization GHG inventoryWork from home - Organization GHG inventory of 2022 does not consider WFH in the ESG report. Model provides for the emissions for Cognizant owned office buildings considered with the full capacity and associates mapped to the respective locations. Model computes WFH emissions beyond this for the FTEs marked to be in WFH mode to add emissions using the IEA published data of emission factors and country level electricity and gas avg consumption per capita numbers. Commute emissions are not added for effort expended in WFH mode.Work from client facility - Emissions for client facility-based effort are estimated using Cognizant emissions factors for the same city/ country/ region  in that order

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I use the Delivery Carbon Footprint Calculator for my client ask
output: The calculator is proposed to be used for both Bid / RFP stage and project life cycle.In RFP stage  purpose is to establish total estimated carbon emissions for proposed scope of workFor Project  purpose is to establish estimated carbon emissions as per SOW scope for entire project duration and then tracking actuals through engagement life cycle through systemic data with LTD and YTD values to be used to control/improve/sustain action planning in projects scopeFor Account  purpose is to measure the actual emissions through systemic data.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is Carbon Footprint What are Green House Gases
output: A Green House Gas is a gas that absorbs and emits radiant energy within the thermal infrared range causing the GreenHouse effect and trapping the heat in the earths atmosphere. The primary greenhouse gases in Earths atmosphere are water vapor carbon dioxide methane nitrous oxide and ozone.The most common GHG emitted through human activity is carbon dioxide CO2. To make calculations more manageable we normalize all GHG numbers to carbon dioxide equivalent CO2eq shortened further to just carbon which is often used to refer to all GHGs. A carbon footprint is the total greenhouse gas emissions caused by an individual event organization service place or product.

instruction: What is the process for project managers to estimate and report actual emissions Reduction
output: As a PM follow below steps to create an estimate and submit actuals after choosing a project from dashboard:Estimation:FTE Information-App will prepopulate the actual effort gone in since 1st Jan 22 or project start date whichever is later distributed by work location resource allocation and planned work model in person years.As PM you would need to append the futuristic effort for the project full duration till project end date with the break-up by location allocation work model in person years to complete the total planned FTE information for full life of projectBusiness travel information-App will prepopulate the already undertaken business travel details for air/rail AMEX and road car for India with systemic input.As PM you would need to append travel details across all 3 categories in the remaining duration till project end date to complete travel information for full life of projectAsset  information-This input is considered as a complexity measure of the project reliance on data centers / server assets and resources rather than a precise headcount of employees working in data centers or on data centers related tasks. As PM this is manual input based on actual engagement scenarioActual SubmissionFTE Information-View the prepopulated LTD post 1st Jan 2022 or project start date whichever is later amp YTD delivery effort in the tabBusiness travel information- View the prepopulated LTD amp YTD business travel details in the tabAsset  information- This input is considered as a complexity measure of the project reliance on data centers / server assets and resources rather than a precise headcount of employees working in data centers or on data centers related task. As PM this is manual input based on actual engagement scenario. This can be updated in month KPI submission

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: The customer wants to de-commission their subscriptions with Cognizant. What is the process
output: As CSP Partners we need to follow the below steps whenever there is a concern for de-commissioning. Analyse the workloads of the customer. Whether all the workloads are at PayG or are there reserved instances as well If there are reserved instances as well we need to check the average monthly consumption of the customer to analyse the unused RI amount At present there is no termination charges on the Reserved Instances but as stated in Microsoft document there will soon be a 12 termination charge on the reserved instance cancellation. We need to raise a support case to know if any termination fees is applicable for the customer. If the amount is less than 50000 then the customer will receive the complete refund. If the unused RI amount is more than 50k we can raise a case with Microsoft to understand the refund amount we will be receiving. Although the chances are unlikely but we can also ask Microsoft to waive off the termination cap. Once we are aware about the refund amount we can ask the Delivery Team to cancel all the workloads. They can raise a technical support case for Microsoft guidance on how to cancel all the workloads and cancel their subscriptions.  Once the subscriptions are cancelled delivery team needs to inform CSP team so that the delivery teams access from CSP Portal can be revoked. Links for more information - Cancel your Azure subscription  Microsoft Docs Self-service exchanges and refunds for Azure Reservations  Microsoft Docs

instruction: what are the benefits of CSP
output: Billing: Cognizant has access to the Billing in the CSP Portal where monthly reconciliation file and invoices are generated. Subscription provisioning and management: With the help of CSP portal we can provision and mange customer subscriptions at ease.  Competitive pricing compared to Enterprise Agreement: Going the CSP route opens up opportunities to gain discounts for RFPs. Greater Flexibility: Our CSP Customer Portal allows you to add or remove licenses or products instantly and consolidate billing into a single automated invoice. Migration Support: With the launch of AMP Azure Migration Program partners get upto10 of the total migration efforts i.e. from on-premises to Cloud. Payment Options: For Reserved instances Microsoft provides an option of upfront as well as monthly payments.

instruction: While cancelling the Azure reservations we are getting an error as the refund cap has been exhausted. What to do
output: CSP Partner initiates the refund from Azure portal for their end customer which will also share the prorated refund details. When the CSP Partner hits the 50K cap policy they will get an error and would suggest you to reach out to Support which would be our team. When the request is raised with Microsoft they engage their internal team to approve the refund with valid business justification provided by the CSP Partner. The project team needs to share a proper justification for the reason of refund Once the request is approved the reservation will be cancelled and prorated refund will be issued which would reflect in the next new invoice which will be available for the CSP Partner. Microsoft will share the prorated refund details linked to the reservation order id once the cancellation is completed from their end.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are emission factors and emission intensity factors
output: Emission factor   An emission factor EF is a coefficient that describes the rate at which a given activity releases greenhouse gases GHGs into the atmosphere. E.g. kg CO2e / KWh for electrical energy kg CO2e / km for travel/vehicle/fuel type combination. Used in Org GHG report for emissions calculations based on category of emissionsEmission intensity factor  Emission intensity is the volume of emissions per unit of GDP. In the model used as computed values of emissions/FTE to calculate the project specific emissions based on FTE involved

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Why does the system still indicate Yet to be submitted despite actual submissions
output: For projects in the landing page the emission details and the status for the latest month is displayed. Refer Reporting Period column which shows the month for which the actuals data is refreshed in the DCFC application. E.g. if the emission actuals are submitted for Mar24. And in the DCFC app we have the data refreshed for Apr24 then the Status will be shown as Yet to be submitted as for Apr24 month the actuals are yet to be submitted.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Is the Opportunity ID important for raising SO
output: For raising Transactional SO- New Demandbillable two manual demands will be allowed per month to create an allocation. If manual demand got exceeded for month Winzone Opportunity ID is mandatory for allocation. For raising Transactional SO- New Demand Non-billable Non billable manual demands can be created and used without any restrictions in no. of allocation. For raising Transactional SO- Backfill a resource Winzone Opportunity ID will get auto-populated which do not fulfill any position from respective Opportunity ID.  For raising Staffing SO- New Demand Billable Winzone Opportunity ID is mandatory where SO should not be raised using manual demand even if system allows. SOs will be rejected from TSC/OE validation team if SO raised using manual demand. For raising Staffing SO- New Demand Non-billable Non billable manual demands can be created and used without any restrictions in no. of positions. For raising staffing SO- Backfill a resource Winzone Opportunity ID will get auto-populated which do not fulfill any position from respective Opportunity ID.

instruction: What is GDAP
output: Granular delegated administrative privilege GDAP is a Microsoft security feature that gives partners more granular and time-bound access to their customers workloads . Its based on the Zero Trust cybersecurity protocol and promotes a model of least privilege. GDAP can help with customer security concerns and can help customers who have regulatory requirements to provide only least-privileged access to partners.   What is GDAP  - Click Here FAQs  - GDAP frequently asked questions - Partner Center  Microsoft Learn

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the difference between managed and resale
output: Managed Services - Cognizant owns the workloads on behalf of the customer and accepts TampC with the vendor. SaaS/PaaS/BPaaS for single / multiple customer. Customers cannot access the environment  but only the solution. Resale - Cognizant resells the services to the end customer with a margin on the list price. Customer accepts TampC with the vendor and accepts Cognizant as the reseller. IaaS/PaaS workloads. Customer can access the environment but vendor billing is handled by Cognizant.

instruction: How can I reserve a GeneralAudio meeting room
output: Please find the below navigation to book a GeneralAudio meeting room: 1. Login https://onecognizant.cognizant.com here. 2. Search Meeting Concierge in the search box.  3. Launch the application.  4. Click on Book meeting room and click on General tab. 5. Select the Date and Timings from the drop down. 6. Type the Subject.  7. Click on Add Room  8. Select the City from the drop down options.  9. From the list select the Office location and check the checkbox if the room is available Green in color. 10. Click on Add to Calendar.  11. Click on Book. The request will be pending with the location admin team who would block the room for you.   Note: To know the status of your approval and availability of meeting rooms kindly reach out to your respective location admin teams using AdminHelpdesk@cognizant.com DL. output: Please follow the below troubleshooting steps if you still face access issues:   1. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How are the scope 1/2/3 emissions accounted for in the carbon calculator
output: Scope 1 and scope 2 emissions - Based on Cognizants latest published GHG Inventory. Includes all the activity data for fuels electricity heat steam refrigerant emissions reported by all Cognizants office facilities and data centers included in Cognizant inventory boundaries. Calculator uses reference data of computed emission intensity factors at country/city/facility level in terms of emissions/FTE to allocate in proportion of the FTE effort employed in the project activity. Scope 3 emissions  These include all the emissions accounted by Cognizant as part of its upstream/downstream supply chain. The Scope 3 emissions for various categories of upstream are allocated according to the FTEs employed in the project delivery activities similarly to the approach followed in Scope 1 and 2. In addition the Model includes project level Scope 3 emissions for specific categories:Category 6: Project Specific Business TravelCategory 7: Employees Working from Home work commuteCategory 8: Use of Leased Assets  Data Centers Cloud Storage/Computing

instruction: How are business travel emissions determined and reported even in the absence of project-specific business travel
output: The Delivery carbon footprint calculator GHG model includes both the contribution to the GHG impact by the resources directly involved in the project delivery as well as by the supporting services provided by Cognizants organization. Thus even though there are no project specific business travel the business travel emissions from the supporting services in the Org GHG inventory are apportioned to the project based on the size of the project.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: When do I include Cognizant Local entity name and signature block for Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. Corporation CTS U.S.
output: When Cognizant are using offshore resources to provide services onshore in the U.S. and your MSA/ MSA novation does not include CTS U.S. signature and associated language then a CTS U.S. signature block needs to be present in the SOW along with the standard language for CTS U.S. reason for signing. CTS U.S. signature is mandatory for immigration purposes so that immigration can petition for a Visa for those offshore resources to work in the U.S. The language is also mandatory for legal purposes to ensure it is clear why CTS U.S. are signing and they cannot be mistaken as being a party to the agreement. Alongside the CWW reference in the preamble the below is the requirement to be included in the document sent for signature: In addition to mentioning CWW should state: Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. Corporation CTS US shall execute this insert type of document here e.g. MSA SOW Change Order solely for purposes of acknowledging that CTS U.S. may provide local services and deliverables within the United States of America to insert name of client on behalf and at the direction of Cognizant Worldwide Limited CWW under this insert type of document here e.g. MSA SOW Change Order. In addition to the CWW signature block include: In addition to CWW signature block should state: Signed below by Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. Corporation CTS U.S. solely for purposes of acknowledging that CTS U.S. may provide local services and deliverables to insert name of client as its referred to in the contract on behalf and at the direction of Cognizant Worldwide Limited in the United States. Add a line to incorporate signatory by CTS U.S. and include: Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. Corporation.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is Reserve Instance flexibility
output: Whenever a VM is configured there is an option to choose between instance size flexibility or capacity priority. Instance size flexibility applies the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Capacity priority designates data center capacity most important for your deployments. By default when the scope of the reservation is shared the instance size flexibility is on. The data Center capacity isnt prioritized for VM deployments. The reserved VMs can be optimised using Reserved instance flexibility.  Here is the example how you can take the benefit: You buy a reserved VM instance with the size Standard_DS4_v2 where the ratio or relative footprint compared to the other sizes in that series is 8.  Scenario 1: Run eight Standard_DS1_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 1. Your reservation discount applies to all eight of those VMs.  Scenario 2: Run two Standard_DS2_v2 sized VMs with a ratio of 2 each. Also run a Standard_DS3_v2 sized VM with a ratio of 4. The total footprint is 2248. So your reservation discount applies to all three of those VMs.  Scenario 3: Run one Standard_DS5_v2 with a ratio of 16. Your reservation discount applies to half that VMs compute cost. More information :Click Here Instance size flexibility ratios

C-hire active offer rejection steps:             Step 1: Enter the Candidate ID in C-hire UI and click on active Submissions             Step 2: click the RR which should be cancelled and click on preview icon             Step 3: Select Navigate away to these submissions and click more actions drop             Step 4: select change step/status and recruiter need to change the status as     Rejected. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the process for filling out Form I-9 compliance
output: Section 1: Employee Information - The employee must complete this section on or before their first day of employment. It includes personal information such as full name maiden name if applicable date of birth address and immigration status. Section 2: Employer Review and Verification - After the employee completes Section 1 the employer or an authorized representative must review the employees original documents in person to verify their identity and work authorization. This should be done within three business days of the employees start date. The employer or authorized representative must record the document information in Section 2 including document title issuing authority document number and expiration date if applicable. The employer or authorized representative must also sign and date Section 2. Section 3: Reverification and Rehires - This section is used for re-verifying an employees work authorization if their employment authorization document expires. If you encounter any issues or errors: Raise a ticket under Form I-9 Compliance application support for assistance. Provide any relevant screenshots or error messages for further support.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.

Once logged in navigate to the Form I-9 compliance section. Complete section 1 with your personal information fields. Assign a reviewer from the dropdown list to complete section 2 of your Form I-9.  If you encounter any issues or errors during the login process Raise a ticket under Form I-9 Compliance application support for assistance. Provide any relevant screenshots or error messages for further support.

instruction: Why Candidate ID is not reflecting in the HCM offer page.
output: These steps should help resolve the issue of a candidate not reflecting in HCM.1.Check if the candidate is tagged to an assessment in Talview.2.Verify if the Candidate ID/Requisition ID is active in Chire.3.Fill out the HRIOS form for the candidate in Talview if it hasnt been done already.4.Redo the HR-Shortlist in Talview to ensure the data is updated in HCM.5.If there is a previously tagged offer in Chire reject it.6.Redo the HR-Shortlist in Talview for the current Requisition ID to update the data in HCM.7.Make sure the offer is tagged for the concerned Recruiter to be visible.8.If you manually pushed the offer in Chire undo the changes and redo the HR-Shortlist in Talview.9.Wait for up to 2 hours for the data to be updated in HCM after the HR shortlist.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How can we ensure accuracy of tax calculation while raising a purchase request in ARIBA
output: To ensure the accuracy of tax calculation while raising a PR in ARIBA it is crucial to correctly input the Bill to Ship to and commodity code fields. The Ship to address determines the tax jurisdiction and rates while the Bill to address is used for invoicing and tax reporting. The commodity code classifies the goods or services affecting applicable tax rates. Incorrect entries in these fields can lead to tax violations resulting in financial penalties reputational damage and operational disruptions.

Please note that the Catalog is defined by the Global Procurement team and has been mapped and made available to Specific User Groups based on their requirements.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What all checkpoints a requisitioner should consider while receiving purchased product from a supplier
output: When receiving purchased products from a supplier a requisitioner should consider the following checkpoints:  Inspect for Damage and Conformity: Ensure products are undamaged. Verify Against Packing Slip: Confirm the description and quantity of items match the packing slip. Compare with Purchase Order: Check consistency between delivered products packing slip and purchase order. Check for Shortages or Overages: Note any discrepancies in quantity. Document Discrepancies: Record any shortages or overages on the delivery receipt before signing. Retain Paperwork: Keep copies of all relevant documents. Initiate Claims for Issues: File claims for any damaged or non-conforming goods identified during inspection.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What steps can be taken by the suppliers to comply with Cognizants Business continuity responsibility as a supplier standard code of conduct
output: To comply with Cognizants Business Continuity responsibility as a supplier suppliers should:  Implement a BCM System: Follow international standards like ISO 22301. Document BCPs: Include continuity resumption and recovery measures for critical employees infrastructure suppliers and IT systems. Regular Testing and Updates: Test review and update BCPs regularly and provide reports on test results and incidents upon request. Training Program: Ensure employees participate in regular BCMS training sessions. Evaluate Suppliers BCM Systems: Assess the BCM systems of their critical suppliers. Incident Notification: Notify Cognizant within 24 hours of any incident affecting BCP integrity or availability and provide regular updates on remediation efforts.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are Cognizants principle for responsible AI
output: Cognizants principles for responsible AI are:  Resilience: AI systems must demonstrate resilience ensuring they can perform as required and recover effectively under specified conditions. Reliability and Accuracy: AI systems should consistently operate and produce outcomes that meet specifications with mechanisms in place to mitigate the risk of hallucinations. Robustness: AI systems need to maintain their performance levels across a variety of conditions including unforeseen circumstances. Comprehensive Documentation: Each stage of the AI system lifecycle and its intended use cases must be clearly defined and documented adhering to relevant regulatory requirements.

instruction: Why is my vendor account reflecting that only partial payment has been made
output: The partial payment reflected in your vendor account is due to the deduction of withholding tax. This tax is subtracted from the total payment resulting in only a portion of the payment being received by the vendor accounts

instruction: How should invoice costs be managed if they are split among different accounts and projects
output: Navigate to the ARIBA homepage and from the More option dropdown select Invoicing. Select the line item and choose Manage Accounting. Click on Add Split to split the cost with other projects and accounts. Click on the arrow to choose the split based on Percentage Amount or Quantity and enter the Percentage split between projects. Update the fields with the project details:      Location Code GL Business Unit Account Project Code Department   Click on Update to see the details. Click on Validate and Exit and hit the Submit option to process the invoice.

instruction: When should an approver be added as a serial approver versus a parallel approver
output: For purchase of good and services we can add an associate as an approver and in case of a serial approver one associate should approve it first and then it will go to next set of approvals whereas in case of parallel approval in a particular step a set of associates will approve it and then it will pass on to the next step.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: When should a new supplier be added
output: A new supplier can be added in Ariba only after the following conditions are met:  Vetted Suppliers: Ensure no suitable suppliers are available in Cognizants Vendor Master for the required goods or services in the relevant region. Due Diligence and Onboarding: Complete the due diligence and onboarding processes by the Global Procurement Supplier Onboarding team and relevant Compliance teams. Internal Audit Review: The onboarding process must pass internal audit review. Procurement Category Team Review: Confirm with the procurement category team that no alternative or preferred suppliers are available. If an alternative supplier is recommended and agreed upon the new supplier request will be cancelled.  Only after these steps are completed can a new supplier be added in Ariba.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the overall process for onboarding a supplier and what are the best practices to ensure compliance
output: To onboard a new supplier on the Ariba platform follow these steps: 1. Start by touching base with a category lead to handle sourcing and supplier shortlisting. 2. Raise a supplier request through Ariba to initiate due diligence and onboarding. 3. Raise a contract request for managing and negotiating the contract terms. 4. Next raise a Purchase Requisition PR for purchase order processing through ARIBA P2P. 5. Finally share the invoice with the finance team to ensure payment processing is completed efficiently. To ensure compliance we need to:  Check for which category and region a new supplier is to be onboarded. Involve the procurement and legal team to approve the sourcing and the commercial requirements through Ariba as it involves a huge amount of spend.  You need to raise a supplier request in Ariba. Download the user manual for reference and use the link provided below to log into Ariba: Supplier Request Process

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is difference between exceutive search and permanent recruitment
output: Executive search refers to HR recruitment for AVP positions and above. Separate firms are responsible for hiring executives and permanent hires. For executive search the vendor takes a retainer or a portion of the retainer at the time of the search. For permanent recruitment the vendor receives a flat fee or a percentage at the time of hire.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the difference in the hiring process for executive and permanent recruiment
output: Please contact your local HR TAG representative for approval and processing of any new Executive Search hires. For Contigent Labor first obtain the local HR Approval. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How can I continue to use my American Express Card if I relocate to another country on a payroll transfer
output: In case of relocation to another country your Amex card in your relocation origination country will be cancelled on your new assignment and payroll start date. You must apply for a new Amex card in your new country. If you have previously resided in your new country you had an Amex card in that country and it was cancelled less than one year ago you can request that it be reinstated by emailing AmexCoreTeam2@cognizant.com. Otherwise you must apply for a new card ASAP AFTER your future country assignment has been processed. Associates must submit any outstanding Corporate Card expenditures on an expense report prior to leaving your relocation origination country.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Will holding a Corporate American Express Card affect my personal credit score
output: Because employees share liability with Cognizant Amex will run and perform a hard inquiry on your personal credit history in some countries. However reporting to credit bureaus is handled differently. Amex will not report negatively to credit bureaus unless your account is significantly past due.In the United States if you have placed a freeze with credit reporting agencies Experian Transamerica and Equifax American Express will reject your application. Before applying contact the credit reporting agencies to unfreeze your account before submitting your application.

Please find the cash withdrawal limits listed below. This limit cannot be accumulated for future periods.India              : Weekly  INR 37500 amp Monthly  INR 150000Argentina   : Corporate Cards 500 pesos per weekEMEA Gulf  : 1000 every 30 days

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the consequences if I terminate my employment with Cognizant and fail to submit my expense reports before my last working day or within the American Express statement pay cycle due date
output: If an associate leaves Cognizant either through resignation or termination and there are outstanding balances on the corporate card or there are possible violations of this policy or the Companys TampE policy Corporate Card Compliance Issues Cognizant may contact the former associate via contact information previously provided to Cognizant by the former associate such as a former associates personal email address to address such Corporate Card Compliance Issues. Cognizants use of such contact information of a former associate will be used in accordance with the Associate Privacy Policy. Please be aware this could also impact the associates personal credit history if they become delinquent and do not clear their card balance before American Express reports it to a credit report agency.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What steps should I take if my expense report has not been approved by my manager resulting in late fees and will the company assume liability for these fees
output: It is your responsibility to ensure that your manager approves your expense report. Company policy dictates that your manager must approve your expense report within 5-business days of your submission. If your manager is not responsive it is your responsibility to escalate your issue to his or her manager. You are responsible for any late fees on your account. Per companys policy late fees are NOT reimbursable.

instruction: Why is the vendor inactive in the system
output: There are various reasons why a vendor or supplier has been deactivated:  Quarterly Deactivation process: On a quarterly basis the Procurement team deactivates any supplier that has had no transactions for 13 or more months. Vendor created for One time payment: When a supplier is set up to receive just one payment the ESA system will automatically deactivate the supplier once the payment has been created. Also various corporate functions Business Units and suppliers request for deactivating vendor or supplier records in the ESA system.  To activate an existing but inactive supplier you must submit a supplier request and follow the onboarding risk assessment and contracting processes as if this is a new supplier onboarding. Attached user manual for reference: User Manual

instruction: How to change a supplier name
output: The name change process depends on whether or not there is a change in the legal entity with Cognizant is doing business. A change in the Tax ID number of the supplier is indicative of a change in the supplier legal entity. When the legal entity changes you must submit a supplier request in Ariba and the supplier must go through our onboarding risk assessment and due diligence process which is also like a new registration process. Below please find a user guide for reference: User Guide If there is no legal entity change and the change is truly just a change in name please reach out to GlobalP2PSupport@Cognizant.com to make your request.

instruction: Why an Invoice been rejected in Ariba
output: Common reasons for an invoice rejection include:  Vendor Inactive: Raise a supplier request in Ariba to activate an existing but inactive supplier. Please see below for a User Manual on how to process a supplier request. Vendor Remit To Address not included on the invoice: Please reach out to GlobalP2PSupport@cognizant.com and provide the Remit To Address details. No matching vendor location in the supplier master: Please raise a supplier request in Ariba to add a new location to a supplier record or ask the supplier to change its location address to match an existing one in Cognizants systems. Please see below for a User Manual on how to process a supplier request.  User Manual

instruction: Why did an invoice not get matched to a Purchase Order in Accounts Payable
output: Invoices and Purchase Orders can be mismatched for several reasons including:  Goods Receipt GRN or RC has not been updated: Once goods or services ordered against a Purchase Order are delivered to you you need to update the Goods Receipt GRN or RC in Ariba as an acknowledgement to the system. Related invoices will not be paid unless you process a GRN or RC. Check that the Supplier has printed the correct Purchase Order  on the invoice.  If all of these are in place request that the Accounts Payable team manually match the invoice against the PO by contacting GlobalP2PSupport@cognizant.com.

instruction: How to change or amend a Purchase Order
output: Amendments to a Purchase Order are only possible when the PO is in Ordered Status. Modifying the Purchase Order will retrigger the approval flow and a new version of the Purchase Order will be sent to the vendor on approval. If a PO Purchase Order is in ordered status please follow the below instructions to make changes to it: Login to Ariba with the below link:     Ariba Login  Look for the PR Purchase Requisition number you are looking to make changes to under My Documents on the home page. Click on the PR number to enter the PR. Click on Edit on the top of the PR page. Make the necessary changes to the PR as needed. Click on Submit. If the Purchase Order is in Received status when you want to make a change contact Globalp2psupport@cognizant.com for assistance.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to change the Bill-to address for purchare request
output: Please follow the below steps to change the bill to address: In your Ariba home screen look for the Purchase Request you have created. Look for the PR number you are looking to make changes to under My Documents on the home page. Click on the PR number to enter the PR. Click on Edit. Scroll to the line level select the line you wish to change and click on Actions. Click on Edit Details. Once inside the line scroll to the accounting section. Click on the dropdown in the Bill-to. Search for the address with the city/state and select the correct address. Scroll to the bottom and click on OK to return to the main page. Once on the main page you will see the option to Submit. Check if all the details are as needed and click on Submit.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I upload an invoice for payment to a Standard Ariba Network account
output: To upload an invoice for payment to a Standard Ariba Network Account:  Note that there is no option to upload an invoice with a Standard Ariba Network account from the Ariba Network portal home page. You must navigate to the email received relating to the Purchase Order against which you wish to invoice. Once redirected to the Ariba home page with the relevant Purchase Order displayed you may upload the invoice.  You may find more detailed steps on how to upload the invoice here:   How to upload an invoice for a Standard Ariba Network Account

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I upload an invoice for payment to an Enterprise Ariba Network account
output: To upload an invoice for payment to an Enterprise Ariba Network Account:  From the Ariba Network home page navigate to the Workbench tab Use the edit filters to search for the relevant Purchase Order against which you wish to invoice and proceed with the invoice submission.  You may find more detailed steps on how to upload the invoice here:   How to upload an invoice for an Enterprise Ariba Network Account

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I get registered in Ariba network to obtain a network account
output: To register for an Ariba network account Cognizant will send you a registration link in any of the below ways: 1. Registration link will be sent along with the first Purchase Order transacted through Ariba to the requested email address 2. The registration link will be sent to the requested email id through the Ariba Network Portal 3. You may receive the direct URL as below: https://service.ariba.com/Supplier.aw/109532055/awawhrampawsskkQC.8wgkampdard1 Using either of the above ways click on the link and complete the registration. Once registered please share the ANID to Cognizant to do the mappings. Mapping refers to establishing the trading relationship with the vendor and linking the vendor Ariba account ID and account admin email address with our vendor ID.

instruction: Who is eligible to receive Cognizant Relationship survey
output: The Client insights team initially selected all VP  and primary contacts for all open and closed opportunities in Winzone 2023 CRS nomination list removed any bounces or voluntary opt outs to create an initial list of survey recipients. Account teams then vet this list in a Winzone Nomination Event in April through early August.   If you would like to remove someone you must obtain SBU head or Country head approval. Then please share the approval message with the Client Insights team we will remove that name.  If the person is no longer with the company the survey email will bounce back and we will remove the name with no further action needed.

instruction: What is Price Builder
output: This pricing tool is currently designated to price time and materials TampM and Fixed Bid opportunities under 25M and less than 5 years in duration.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Why is this called Price Builder
output: As an internal Cognizant application Price Builder was selected as it describes how we use the app to construct the price of our opportunities.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Is Price Builder required
output: The tool is mandated for all TampM and Fixed Bid opportunities less than 25M.   Price Builder will not apply to the following:  1.Intuitive Operations amp Automation IOampA  2.Non-Integrated Businesses NIBs  3.Software Products Group TriZetto  4.Deals longer than 5 years in duration  5.Deals with Knowledge Transfer KT  6.costs greater than 250000  7.Deals requiring a cashflow statement

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the difference between the Deals Module and the Rate Cards Module
output: The Rate Cards Module is used to create and publish client rate cards. Once published they are available for use in the Deals Module in a TampM or Fixed Bid deal. Additionally the Deals module is used to create TampM or Fixed Bid deals that include Client Roles from rate cards Cognizant roles Non-labor and Subcontractor roles.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Why a system outside of WinZone
output: In 2021 we investigated multiple pricing solutions and determined this was the best fit based on the Cognizant business requirements and functionality needed.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How was Price Builders vendor chosen
output: OnCorps is a small application provider who specializes in pricing small deal transactions for projects. We evaluated the tools ability to meet Cognizants requirements in 2021 and a decision was made to move forward into Pilot. After an extensive pilot we chose to move forward with a company-wide roll-out.

instruction: My cost does not look right.
output: Price Builder provides elemental costs allowing the user insights for comparison against expected results. Cost adders can be toggled off and on unit cost by role can be viewed in the roles/rates grid and exported to support further analysis. The deals module reports available on the quotes page provide additional analytics.  In the Rate Card module there is a rate card detail tab to see very specific cost elements by role.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How is inflation calculated
output: Inflation is based upon an estimate of inflation by country based upon available indices and consultation with Market FPampA. As a company we update inflation rates in the pricing tools annually and analyze quarterly for updating.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How are the thresholds calculated
output: Threshold rates represent the maximum suggested discount from Market Benchmark rates.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Where do the market rates come from
output: We engage a third-party advisor to provide market pricing data. Global Pricing Practice areas and Markets collaborate to determine the appropriate rates for Cognizant rates.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: I disagree with the market rate data - my client wouldnt agree to that
output: Our Market Rates are a starting point and threshold rates exist to allow you to go to a maximum suggested discount. Market rates are a guide and they are an external view of the market going rate for that particular role.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Are the rates in Price Builder the same as the rates in ESA Which one do I use and when
output: ESA rates are billing rates and Price Builder has selling rates. In general they are closely related and often the same. However there are reasons why they may differ e.g. volume discounts applied to ESA/billing rates. Price Builder rates should be used for pricing your opportunities ESA rates should be used for invoicing the client.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Hybrid for a Location Type seems to be new. How do I use a hybrid seat cost
output: When choosing a location type for any role Hybrid and WFH are options included in the January 2023 major release in Price Builder. In general Hybrid should be used when the user thinks resources will spend some time at a Cognizant site but not full time. The hybrid rate is calculated based upon an assumed average of time on Cognizant site versus working from home.  In the Deals module click on Add Customer Roles choose Labor enter your role name click on the Add button in the Labor entry screen select your normal fields including your Source Country from the drop-down menu then your Location Type will sow Hybrid as long as Cognizant has a cost for that particular geographic area this means we have a Cognizant facility in that area.  Once in your grid the FPampA standard cost rates will be  applied to that particular role. It is HIGHLY recommended that you edit roles individually for making location changes to ensure the Market Rate and Cost Rates are fully aligned. If they are not Price Builder will show a hard error for the user to correct as seen in the helper text or validation screen.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: When do I use the Deals module vs the Rate Cards module
output: The Rate Cards module is used to develop or analyze rates that will be used repeatedly on call offs and statements of work at a given client. Once this effort is completed the rate card is then published and available within Price Builder for use in the deals module.   The Deals module is used to create new TampM pricing models using published client contract rates Cognizant rates subcontractor and nonlabor solution elements.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I know which cost grade to map
output: Cost grade mapping aligns the client and Market rates pairings to the expected Cognizant grade and cost base that will be staffed to fulfill the role. When a Market rate is mapped user is provided with grade recommendations in the cost rate mapping pop-up window. These recommended grade mappings are a guide. Users are able to map to other grades but use caution to make sure your cost grades are inline with the selected market role. Without a market role mapped no guidance is provided

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I know which Market Role to pick
output: User should map client roles to Cognizant Market rates by selecting the Country the Practice and then the Skill Cluster. Then select the specific role using the role name and the years of experience.

output: Using the Deal Sharing Deals module or Rate Card Sharing Rate Cards module tab you may share a deal/rate card with one or many registered users or transfer ownership to another registered user.

instruction: How is the Target Start Date created and set
output: The Target Start Date is set on the Scenario Definition page.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the logic for the Target End Date updating relative to the Start Date Added
output: The Target End Date is limited 5 years 60 months after the start date. As you enter a valid Target Start Date the valid range for the Target End Date will adjust to reflect up to 60 months in the future. Using the data picker or by typing the date in directly the user must select a date within the valid range.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Is there any implication or relationship with the Estimated Close Date and the Target Start Date
output: The Estimated Close Date is the date you expect to close the deal with the client also known as the booking or signing date. The Target Start Date is the date you expect to start performing on the effort being priced. Typically Estimated Close Date is before the Target Start Date as you are expected to have a signed contract before starting work.

output: When creating a scenario click Add or Copy Scenario Data from existing scenariosCheck boxes can be clicked to select roles to add from any of your deals/rate cards. Select which roles you want to copy into the scenario and select either:  Add Roles to add the role structure only  Add Roles and Copy Scenario Data to  replicate the entire scenario role structure dates effort price/cost adjustments and any discounts/SLA penalties.
