instruction: What is a tower
output: Towers are user-defined groupings set up on the Scenario Definition page. On the roles grid you may allocate a tower for a particular role but may not define new towers. The reports generated from Pricing Builder provide a view of the bid data grouped into the towers.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I close a deal
output: Saving a quote will create a locked view of the current state of your scenario. This includes all current financial factors inflation FX as well as the current cost rates market rates and threshold rates. All financial reporting for this view will be available. As you make changes to the current scenario you will need to generate a new quote. You may have multiple quotes for each scenario. Once a deal is won mark the associated quote as Won. This will send the Pricing Artifact to WinZone and the opportunity data to EDS for downstream system consumption.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can I price in FTEs
output: Price Builder supports solutioning in person hours or person days. The user should convert their FTEs into hours or days before entering in the app.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Price builder winzone integration
output: Price Builder includes a real-time WinZone connection. We have an expected timeframe of 5-10 minutes from any new WinZone update. If the window is longer than 10 minutes and your data does not come into Price Builder we will need to verify your situation.  Please report this issue to GSD IT and they can assist you.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.

output: Price Builder includes a real-time WinZone connection. We have an expected timeframe of 5-10 minutes from any new WinZone update. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: I only know FTEs. How do I convert to hours or days
output: In the Scenario definition page it will display the total number of hours / days based on the duration of your deal start date to end date. It would be FTEs multiplied by the number to give you a rough number. NOTE: this does NOT take into account holiday expected time off vacations or personal time off.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Do we need to account for holidays/vacations/sick time when building the pricing
output: Labor cost rates assume an hourly cost for an associate. When costing your deal you should consider any volume hour buffer needed to account for non-productive time. When developing price the contractual billable hours needs to be considered. If for instance the contract has a cap on billable hours per day e.g. 8 and the associate works 9 hours/day an uplift to the rate would need to be considered. You should also look at the definition of contract billable hours to see what non-productive time may have to be excluded from billing.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can I import my UPT file or another Excel file
output: Price Builder has a Quick Add feature to allow easy and efficient copy and pasting of your UPT data to load into your rate card or deal grid.

instruction: I accidentally deleted a deal/scenario. How can I restore it Is there a backup
output: Upon attempting to delete either a deal or scenario you will be prompted to confirm this activity given this will be permanent. There is no backup or ability for the user to restore once deleted.

instruction: How do I add and what contingency should I apply
output: Contingency is set on the Cost Adjustment tab. The default is 2 and that represents the minimum deals only. Contingency should be applied in line with the risk rating of your deal.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How are payment terms factored into the calculations
output: Selecting the payment terms will drive any necessary payment terms cost adder. The percent adder is displayed on the cost adjustment page and is shown on a separate line item of the PampL.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Do I have to use the recommended grade mappings
output: The recommended grade mappings are a guide coinciding with the selected market role. Users are able to map to other grades but use caution to make sure your cost grades are inline with the selected market role.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Where do I add costs for expected missed SLAs and such
output: SLA Penalties are modelled on the Price Page after the Customer Roles Grid is completed. Click the Activate SLA Penalty button and enter the percent to use by tower/phase. The SLA Penalty does not change the price to the client but is reflected in the PampL statement.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What does KT and SS mean How do I know which to use
output: KT  Knowledge Transfer SS  Steady State.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Do I have to enter information in Price Builder and in WinZone/PCB/SO/ESA
output: Price Builder is working to streamline the data entry process. The app pulls information in from WinZone sends the Pricing Artifact to WinZone Pricing Approval Record and sends opportunity data to the data warehouse for downstream systems like PCB to consume. Check with the product owners of those other systems for more detail about when they will be pulling information from Price Builder via EDS.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: When do I update WinZone with financials
output: Please refer to WinZone policies that address requirements for each Opportunity Stage. Pricing models from quotes can be sent from Stage 3 and beyond by marking the Price Builder Quote as Won.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Does Deal information feed WinZone
output: The app pulls information in from WinZone sends the Pricing Artifact to WinZone Pricing Approval Record and sends opportunity data to the data warehouse for downstream systems like PCB to consume.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Are there rules on how much I can discount
output: Discounting should be done in conjunction with any contractual agreements with the client. Discounting is entered on the price page in the Deals module.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Where do I enter volume discounts
output: Clicking on the Activate Discount button on the Price page results in a pop-up that will allow you to set a  discount by tower and phase. Adding a negative number will result in a premium. The discount or premium will be shown as a reduction or addition to revenue in the PampL and is not included in the rates themselves.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can I get a list of all my deals in Price Builder
output: On the Deals page of Price Builder you are able to see a list of all of your deals as well as any deals that have been shared with you. You can also view the Deals List in a Grid view. The grid can be exported into excel by right clicking and choosing export.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can I mix and match rate cards in pricing
output: Yes. Upon entry of the Customer ID on the Deal Background page you will have access to all rate cards published for that client and may select the ones for use in the deal. On the Customer Roles page after selecting Add Contract Rates you will be able to identify the client rate card you would like to add rates from.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the math behind the duration calculation
output: The duration calculation is a count of the number of business days between the target start date and the target end date inclusively. If the scenario is in hours then the calculated number of days is multiplied by 8.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Can we resell this solution to our clients How can we monetize this to Cognizants benefit
output: Price Builder is a third-party application authorized for internal use only.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: In my deal I pulled in contract rates and Id like to change the default location type. How do I do that
output: Choose to edit the individual role select a different Location Type and then verify the Market Rate and Cost Rate for that particular role.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: I no longer see the ability to add Contract Rates in the Add Customer Roles menu. How do I add Contract Rates
output: In the Customer Roles page click on the Add Contract Rates from the bottom menu. Note this option only appears when you have selected a Rate Card on the Deal Background screen.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: I need to override the chargeable hours per day for a particular role. Can I go lower than 8 or 9 hours
output: Yes. Go to the Customer Roles page select to edit a particular role scroll down to the Override hours per day and enter your number. Price Builder shows in the helper text what a valid hours range is. It is currently set from 7 to 9 hours. Changing this will automatically update your sell rate show how it compares to benchmark and threshold and show you the CP margin based on the current costs for those hours. If you have changed the sell rate re-calculate it if needed since the hours changed and your base unit price remained the same. Price Builder leaves the price as is in case the user would like it to remain. Simply click Set price to benchmark option to return the base unit price to benchmark for the over-ridden hours. Reminder: hours per day cannot be edited from contract rates pulled into a deal.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are the hours per day I can program for my contractual rate card
output: Hours per day is an attribute of the rate that comes from a published rate card. Contract rate hours per day cannot be edited in the Deals module. If you are the rate card owner please reach out to PriceBuilderConcierge@cognizant.com for assistance with editing your published rate card.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: If I have a new role that I am defining and have a maximum number of hours charged per day how do I enter this in the Deals module
output: Add in your new roles and once loaded into the grid scroll to the right into the Role Definition section to see the default hours per day. To change them click on the individual role to override the default hours. This only works for non-published rate card contract roles.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I enter non-billable resources in my deal and report the costs only
output: Currently there is no way to price a zero charge resource labor/non-labor. Put in a penny 0.01 for this instance. You can also put all zero charge items in a tower of its own and then discount the entire tower.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I update COLA
output: To update COLA for a deal navigate to the Price Adjustments page and confirm COLA caps in the deal specific price adjustment section. COLA for a published Rate Card can only be updated by the rate card owners. The owner would access the published rate card in the Rate Cards module navigate to the Publish Rate Card page select Update COLA revise the COLA s and then select Update at the bottom of the page to republish the rate card with the new COLA rates. Once updated no additional action is required for those using the rate card in the deals module.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: I want travel to be billed as incurred - how do I enter that
output: On the Cost Adjustment page there is the opportunity to add TampE  by country phase and year. If you toggle on the reimbursable button the  entered will be added as both cost and revenue to the PampL. If off the  entered will be added as cost to the PampL. If no  is entered regardless of toggle it is assumed to be handled outside of the tool i.e. as incurred via contract language.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What are payment terms adders and why do we have them
output: Payment terms refer to the number of days until the customer invoice is due. The payment terms adder  which is set by FPampA is the cost adder corresponding to the payment terms selected. The cost will be shown as a separate line item in the PampL amp Financial Summary.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What happens when I turn off the inflation toggle on the edit role page
output: When you deselect the inflation toggle on the edit role page cost inflation is not applied to the cost of that role.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is a quote in Price Builder
output: Creating the quotes is about history and visibility and making sure we have a clear understanding of what a client has seen relative to our pricing over time. Saving a quote will create a locked view of the current state of your scenario. This includes all current financial factors inflation FX as well as the current cost rates market rates and threshold rates. All financial reporting for this view will be available.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How is the quote used
output: Quotes can be used internally only to share with the account team during pricing activities for certain deal parameters and resource mixes for the client. Think of quotes as your specific pricing file or previous UPT versions that would iterate the pricing differences for the client engagement. Creating the quotes is about history and visibility and making sure we have a clear understanding of what a client has seen relative to our pricing over time. Saving a quote will create a locked view of the current state of your scenario. This includes all current financial factors inflation FX as well as the current cost rates market rates and threshold rates. All financial reporting for this view will be available.

instruction: Who can see my quotes

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Why is the next icon greyed out
output: The next icon will be greyed out to prevent you from progressing in Price Builder if you have not completed all required fields. Please review prior screen messaging and resolve any hard errors.

instruction: What is the process for generating a quote and getting approval
output: Quotes are not officially approved within Price Builder. The pricing that is done in Price Builder is externally reviewed and approved via the current DOA process.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I update the status of the quote What do the statuses mean
output: On the Quote Page you are able to update the status of each quote via a drop-down menu with the options of Not sent to client Sent to client Won Lost Cancelled. Each status other than Not sent to client will require a date to be entered. At that point no status update is allowed for any other quotes. Marking a Quote as Won will send the Pricing Artifact to WinZone and the Opportunity Data to EDS for consumption by downstream systems.

instruction: Why do I have to go back in and mark a quote a win or a loss
output: Marking a Quote as Won will send the Pricing Artifact to WinZone and the Opportunity Data to EDS for consumption by downstream systems.

output: The quote is not shared back to WinZone but the Pricing Artifact is attached to the WinZone Pricing Approval Record when the quote is marked as Won.

instruction: I cannot delete my quote. Why
output: Users do not have the ability to delete a quote from Price Builder. If you need to delete a quote please reach out to PriceBuilderConcierge@cognizant.com for assistance.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is a pricing artifact What do I attach in WinZone
output: The term pricing artifact refers to the reports available from Price Builder once a quote has been created. For Deals priced in Price Builder the Role Economics is sent to the WinZone Pricing Approval Record when the Quote is marked Won. For Rate Cards developed in Price Builder the Financial Summary should be attached to the related WinZone opportunity.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What reporting is available
output: From the Deals Quotes Page you are able to download the following reports: Monthly csv Role Economics Customer Pricing Exhibit Contract amp Calendar Year. For both Deals and Rate Cards the Financial Summary is available via email. Additionally the user may export the Roles/Rates grid details within each module by right-clicking anywhere in the grid and choosing your download option.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How do I get to the OSLI information
output: OSLI data is not currently mapped to Market Rates/roles. Follow your current WinZone process to enter the OSLI data.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: When will PCB data from Price Builder be available
output: When a Quote is marked as Won and the Role Economics Report has been successfully sent to WinZone Price Builder sends the opportunity data to EDS for consumption by downstream systems like PCB. Please direct any questions about the timing of PCB ingestion of data to your typical PCB contact.

instruction: Can I get to a financial summary without generating a quote
output: You are not able to get a Financial Summary without generating a quote. However for deals you are able to view the PampL by tower on the screen and right-click to export to csv xlsx or xlm.

instruction: Do I have to wait for the email to receive a financial summary

instruction: User is getting Associate is released to CDP/PDP error
output: If associate having active allocation in BU project and still getting Associate is in CDP/PDP error associate might have active release or may be already approved for release in TMP backend. In this case ensure to cancel the release request of the associate in TMP amp try allocating through transactional SO or else please raise Staffing SO and allocate the associate in TMP once SO approved from TSC/OE. If associate have direct allocation in CDP/PDP projects in ESA please raise Staffing SO and allocate the associate in TMP once SO approved from TSC/OE. If associate have active in Irise purpose please reach out to AllocApproveByEDL@cognizant.com for allocation without cancelling the release.

instruction: how to get the allocation to the project
output: If associate is already identified and moving from one project to another within account Please login to Quick SO in 1C gtgt Allocate an Identified associate gtgt New Demand or Backfill a resource and raise SO to allocate an associate. If associate is already identified and active in CDP/PDP or different account movement or external hired associate or for Promotion Eligible SO Please login to Quick SO in 1C gtgt Raise a New Demand gtgt New Demand or Backfill a resource and raise SO. Once SO approved from TSC/OE validation team allocate the associate in TMP portal.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to create a Transactional SO request
output: To create a Transactional SO request follow these steps:  Click on the Allocate an Identified associate and New Demand or Backfill a resource. Choose the project ID and enter the Identified Associate ID amp select along with associate name. Select billability date billability Role project role start date end date and allocation percentage amp Click on Save amp Continue. Review the location details which is auto-populated based on associate ESA location. Click on Submit.  If you need any help with SO creation please reach out to the SOSimplificationPM@cognizant.com. Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Is there an option to edit the SO and change the Hiring Manager primary skills  or grade of requirement
output: To update the Hiring Manager ID in an SO request follow these steps:  Login to ESA page https://compass.esa.cognizant.com/. Click on Main Menu and select Resource Management. Click on Request Resource and then select Create or Review SO. Search by SO ID and Project ID. Modify the required information such as Start and end date Hiring Manager ID Location Experience HCM Set ID and Job code skills Demand role and grade cannot be modified. Click on Complete Order. Click on Save and Submit to submit the SO request.  Please note that only the above mentioned information can be modified. If you want to modify any other information please contact the TSC Shared Services team through Servicenow portal https://ctsccprod.service-now.com/ss. Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.
